entries.journal_entry_description: Stop the Rebel Alliance troops from evacuating Echo Base.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Find the rebel hangar bay and ensure that Imperial snowtroopers are able to disable it.
entries.task01_journal_entry_title: Protect Imperial Snowtroopers as they Disable the Hangar Bay
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Find and capture the Rebel command center by defeating all of the personnel there.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Find the ion cannon capacitor and ensure that Imperial snowtroopers are able to destroy it.
entries.task03_journal_entry_title: Protect Imperial Snowtroopers while they Destroy the Ion Cannon Capacitor
entries.task06_journal_entry_description: Find and destroy Rebel Alliance equipment crates in Echo Base.
entries.task07_journal_entry_description: Find and destroy Rebel Alliance medical supplies in Echo Base.
entries.task08_journal_entry_description: Find the Rebel's food stores and destroy them.
